entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -12.3°C
entry.summary:

Temperature: -12.3°C
Pressure: 99.4 kPa

Humidity: 84 %

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Snow ending near midnight then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 late this evening. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 14.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the morning. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 33 in the morning and minus 23 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 6 by morning. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 6 by morning. Wind chill minus 23 in the evening and minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 05 February 2023
